As soon as we get through the year, Resident Evil Requiem will quickly become the most anticipated thing in gaming, if it isn’t already, and no matter what platform you want to play it on. Alongside pre-order listings for the new RE9 going live across console and PC, a brand Resident Evil Requiem Nintendo Switch 2 Pro controller has been revealed alongside the announcement of upcoming amiibo and details on the deluxe edition and pre-order bonuses. Pre-orders for all platforms are starting to appear on Amazon and over at Best Buy.

Bruno Marc Casual Slip-on Sneakers

Buy for $24 (Reg. $37)

Apply code 20UD6SXG during checkout.

What we love

While the all-white and olive variants of this shoe catch my eye the most, I don’t think you can really go wrong with any of these styles. Even at the full $37 price, these are far from a bad value, but stacking the code above on top of these already discounted shoes takes them all way down to $24.

items.summary:
OMOTON 4-Card MagSafe Wallet

Buy for $9.50 (Reg. $20)

Clip the on-page 50% off coupon.

What we love

While a lot of MagSafe wallets out there can hold more cards than this, some folks don’t have a need more than four. I’m one of those people, and only carry 2-3 (including my ID). I like the sleek look of this offering and that it can also function as an iPhone kickstand.

items.title: Tested: The Baseus PrimeTrip VR2 Max 240W ends my search for a powerful, reliable car charger [Deal]
items.summary:
It’s true that most modern cars come equipped with a couple of USB ports or even wireless charging pads, but nothing quite matches the convenience of a dedicated charger that plugs into the auxiliary port for fast, reliable power delivery. While Amazon is packed with car chargers of every kind, the Baseus PrimeTrip VR2 Max model, we’re checking out today, stands out from the crowd. This unit not only features multiple ports and connectors to charge up to four devices at once, but it also swivels and rotates for flexible positioning. That means you can easily adjust it to your seating setup for added convenience. I recently took it along on a road trip, and it’s quickly become my go-to car charger. Here’s a closer look at why I believe it’s such a dependable and well-designed pick.

more…

Sometimes you only have one USB-C power source to work with, and that’s exactly when a cable like this can come in handy. It can distribute up to 100W of power between two devices and I love that it has a retractable design.

ORICO Aluminum M.2 NVMe SSD Enclosure

Buy for $12 (Reg. $16)

What we love

I’ve been using enclosures like this to craft my own user-upgradeable SSDs for years now. While one can certainly argue that it’s easier to pick up a fully-assembled external SSD from a well-known manufacturer, you’ll always be stuck with it, but this unit allows you to tinker and swap drives whenever you want.
